suggest_nami: Use the NamiExchange application for the best experience
description: Transfer assets from Nami Wallet to ONUS Wallet
tips: Assets will be withdrawn to your VNDC wallet in a short time.

err.min_wdl_not_met: The amount withdrawn has not reached the minimum value, please try again.
err.invalid_input: Invalid withdrawal amount, please try again.
err.logged_out: Your account has been logged out.
err.insufficient: Your balance is not enough, please try again.
err.not_in_range: Input amount is not in range {{min_from_value}} - {{max_from_value}} XBT, please try again.
err.unknown: There is a problem during the withdrawal process, please contact support for more details.
err.vndc_maintain: VNDC is maintaining the off-chain withdrawal of VNDC from Nami, you can still withdraw on-chain from Nami app.
